verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w morning|strong="G4404"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w held|strong="G4160"\w* a \w consultation|strong="G4824"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, and \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, and \w carried|strong="G0667"\w* \add him\add* \w away|strong="G0667"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \add him\add* to \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w sayest|strong="G3004"\+w* \+add it\+add*.\wj*
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w accused|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* of many \w things|strong="G4183"\w*: but he answered nothing.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Answerest \w thou|strong="G0611"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*? \w behold|strong="G1492"\w* how many \w things|strong="G4214"\w* they witness \w against|strong="G2649"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w yet|strong="G3765"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*; so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w at|strong="G2596"\w* \add that\add* \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* he \w released|strong="G0630"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w*, \w whomsoever|strong="G3746"\w* they \w desired|strong="G0154"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \add one\add* \w named|strong="G3004"\w* \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w*, \add which lay\add* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* had made insurrection with \w him|strong="G4955"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* had \w committed|strong="G4160"\w* \w murder|strong="G5408"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w insurrection|strong="G4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* crying \w aloud|strong="G0310"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w desire|strong="G0154"\w* \add him to do\add* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w had|strong="G4160"\w* \w ever|strong="G0104"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Will \w ye|strong="G2309"\w* that I \w release|strong="G0630"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* had \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w moved|strong="G0383"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he \w should|strong="G0630"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w release|strong="G0630"\w* \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* will \w ye|strong="G2309"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* that I shall \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \add unto him\add* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w call|strong="G3004"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*?
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w*, \w what|strong="G1063"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* hath he \w done|strong="G4160"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w* the more \w exceedingly|strong="G4056"\w*, \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \add so\add* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w willing|strong="G1014"\w* to \w content|strong="G4160"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w released|strong="G0630"\w* \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, when he had \w scourged|strong="G5417"\w* \add him\add*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* be \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w led|strong="G0520"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0520"\w* \w into|strong="G2080"\w* the \w hall|strong="G0833"\w*, \w called|strong="G2076"\w* \w Prætorium|strong="G4232"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they call \w together|strong="G4779"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w band|strong="G4686"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w clothed|strong="G1746"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* with \w purple|strong="G4209"\w*, and \w platted|strong="G4120"\w* a \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* of \w thorns|strong="G0174"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* put it \w about|strong="G4060"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \add head\add*,
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Hail|strong="G5463"\w*, \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*!

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w smote|strong="G5180"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* on the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* with a \w reed|strong="G2563"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* did \w spit|strong="G1716"\w* upon \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bowing|strong="G5087"\w* \add their\add* \w knees|strong="G1119"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they had \w mocked|strong="G1702"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they took \w off|strong="G1562"\w* the \w purple|strong="G4209"\w* \w from|strong="G1562"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G1746"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G1806"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1806"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w compel|strong="G0029"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* a \w Cyrenian|strong="G2956"\w*, who passed \w by|strong="G3855"\w*, coming \w out|strong="G2064"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w country|strong="G0068"\w*, the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w Alexander|strong="G0223"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Rufus|strong="G4504"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w bear|strong="G0142"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w bring|strong="G5342"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w Golgotha|strong="G1115"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, being \w interpreted|strong="G3177"\w*, The \w place|strong="G5117"\w* of a \w skull|strong="G2898"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* mingled with \w myrrh|strong="G4669"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \add it\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w parted|strong="G1266"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w*, \w casting|strong="G0906"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* every \w man|strong="G5101"\w* should \w take|strong="G0142"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w superscription|strong="G1923"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w accusation|strong="G0156"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* written \w over|strong="G1924"\w*, THE \w KING|strong="G0935"\w* OF THE \w JEWS|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* they \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w thieves|strong="G3027"\w*; the \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* his right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w other|strong="G1520"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w left|strong="G2176"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* was \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w numbered|strong="G3049"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w transgressors|strong="G0459"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w that|strong="G3588"\w* passed \w by|strong="G3899"\w* railed \w on|strong="G0987"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w wagging|strong="G2795"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Ah|strong="G3758"\w*, thou \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w destroyest|strong="G2647"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w buildest|strong="G3618"\w* \add it\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*,
\w Save|strong="G4982"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w mocking|strong="G1702"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*, He \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w*; \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* he \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w*.

Let \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w descend|strong="G2597"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w that|strong="G3588"\w* were \w crucified|strong="G4957"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w reviled|strong="G3679"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* the \w ninth|strong="G1766"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* at the \w ninth|strong="G1766"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w cried|strong="G0994"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Eloi|strong="G1682"\+w*, \+w Eloi|strong="G1682"\+w*, \+w lama|strong="G2982"\+w* \+w sabachthani|strong="G4518"\+w*?\wj* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, being \w interpreted|strong="G3177"\w*, \w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* hast thou \w forsaken|strong="G1459"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* of them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* stood \w by|strong="G3936"\w*, when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, he \w calleth|strong="G5455"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w ran|strong="G5143"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w filled|strong="G1072"\w* a \w spunge|strong="G4699"\w* \w full|strong="G1072"\w* of \w vinegar|strong="G3690"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w put|strong="G4060"\w* \add it\add* on a \w reed|strong="G2563"\w*, and \w gave|strong="G4222"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w drink|strong="G4222"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Let \w alone|strong="G0863"\w*; let us \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w* will \w come|strong="G2064"\w* to \w take|strong="G2507"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w down|strong="G2507"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w cried|strong="G0863"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, and gave up the \w ghost|strong="G1606"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w veil|strong="G2665"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* was \w rent|strong="G4977"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w twain|strong="G1417"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w top|strong="G0509"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* the \w bottom|strong="G2736"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* when the \w centurion|strong="G2760"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w stood|strong="G3936"\w* \w over|strong="G1537"\w* \w against|strong="G1727"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2896"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w*, and gave up the \w ghost|strong="G1606"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Truly|strong="G0230"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* looking \w on|strong="G2334"\w* \w afar|strong="G3113"\w* \w off|strong="G0575"\w*: \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* the \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* of \w James|strong="G2385"\w* the \w less|strong="G3398"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Joses|strong="G2499"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Salome|strong="G4539"\w*;

(\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*;) \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* other \w women|strong="G0243"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* came \w up|strong="G4872"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* when the \w even|strong="G3798"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, \w because|strong="G1893"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w preparation|strong="G3904"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, the day before the \w sabbath|strong="G4315"\w*,

\w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Arimathaea|strong="G0707"\w*, an \w honourable|strong="G2158"\w* \w counsellor|strong="G1010"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* waited \w for|strong="G4327"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, and went \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w boldly|strong="G5111"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w craved|strong="G0154"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* he \w were|strong="G2348"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w dead|strong="G2348"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w calling|strong="G4341"\w* \add unto him\add* the \w centurion|strong="G2760"\w*, he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* he had \w been|strong="G0599"\w* any \w while|strong="G3819"\w* \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \add it\add* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w centurion|strong="G2760"\w*, he \w gave|strong="G1433"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* to \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w bought|strong="G0059"\w* fine \w linen|strong="G4616"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2507"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w down|strong="G2507"\w*, and wrapped him \w in|strong="G1750"\w* the \w linen|strong="G4616"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G2698"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w hewn|strong="G2998"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* a \w rock|strong="G4073"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rolled|strong="G4351"\w* a \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w* of the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \add the mother\add* of \w Joses|strong="G2499"\w* \w beheld|strong="G2334"\w* \w where|strong="G4225"\w* he was \w laid|strong="G5087"\w*.
